name: Teeth Pulling
description:
A late night snack leads to a dental nightmare.

A very short, very basic first-person horror game I made while teaching myself game design. Mostly a learning exercise; feedback is welcome. A playthrough should take about 5 minutes. Enjoy!

Note: Game over jumpscare doesn't work properly in browser. For the full experience, the download version is recommended. 

-------------------------------------------

Controls

WASD to move

Shift to run

E to interact/skip text popup

Space to restart on game over
